dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S947 IS: SAFE Act Confidentiality and Privilege Enhancement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Hagan (for herself, Mr. Toomey, Mr. Manchin, and Mr. Johanns) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To ensure access to certain information for financial services industry regulators, and for other purposes.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
SAFE Act Confidentiality and Privilege Enhancement Act .

section.header: Confidentiality of information shared between state and federal financial services regulators
section.text: Section 1512(a) of the S.A.F.E. Mortgage Licensing Act of 2008 ( 12 U.S.C. 5111(a) ) is amended by inserting ‘‘or financial services’’ before ‘‘industry’’.
